errors.nameRequired: You must provide an essence name

tooltip.label: Tooltip text

description.label: Description (optional)

summary.label: Summary

errors.nameRequired: You must provide a crafting system name
errors.summaryRequired: You must provide a summary of the crafting system
errors.invalidSystemDefinition: Fabricate attempted to create an invalid Crafting System. Check the console (F12) for more information

editor.locked: This crafting system is bundled with Fabricate and cannot be modified

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.description: Components in a disabled system cannot be salvaged, the system's recipes cannot be crafted, and its alchemy cannot be performed.

description.label: Description
description.noValue: This system doesn't have a detailed description yet.

deleteSystemConfirm.content: Delete {systemName}? This action cannot be undone.
deleteSystemConfirm.title: Fabricate | Delete crafting system

essences.description: Essences are a quality of a component. They define something that the component has, not something that it is. Components might have multiple Essences in different quantities, all of which you can define for your system. Not every crafting system needs essences. However, if you do want to add them to components, you'll need to define them here first.

submissionError.prefix: There were some problems with your form
